p: E. grandiflorum extract was milled with potassium bromide (KBr) powder and pellets were prepared by pressing. After making the pellets FTIR spectrometer (Model Bruker Platinum ATR with accessories A225/Q Platinum ATR Multiple Crystals CRY diamond and having Interferogram Size of 10550 points) in the frequency range of 400-4,000/cm was used to analyze for the identification of functional groups as representative of wide range of important phytoconstituents.
